column4: - depends on the application - a database will chew up 20GB with a quickness
scribbled2x: ParadigmUltra: What do you recommend for partition sizes to dual boot with vista for someone who's starting to delve a bit deeper into the coding/programming world?
ParadigmUltra: by the way, I have no experience with partitions what so ever, so I hope one of you can walk me through it.
- there are way too many more knowledgable and experienced users here for me to suggest - I am stubbling through this usually with my head up my butt
